dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold action to capitalize on opportunities, even if it means taking calculated risks.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security, avoiding high-risk investments and cautious with bold moves.

dimensions.label: Growth Mindset
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be open to learning and adjusting, embracing change as a natural part of growth.
Your FarTwin will focus on building internal strength, persevering through obstacles rather than adapting to new situations.

dimensions.label: Social Dynamics
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and sociable, thriving in group settings and forming strong connections.
Your FarTwin will prefer one-on-one interactions or smaller groups, conserving energy for meaningful relationships.

dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach innovation?

options.description: Your FarTwin will think outside the box, seeking novel solutions and pushing boundaries to achieve greatness.
Your FarTwin will focus on making incremental improvements and refining existing ideas, rather than taking bold risks.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex issues into manageable parts, analyzing data and evidence to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and pattern recognition, trusting their gut feelings and experience to guide decision-making.

dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tackle multiple projects simultaneously, fueled by energy and motivation.
Your FarTwin will concentrate on a single task at a time, eliminating distractions to achieve efficiency.

dimensions.label: Financial Decision-Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and budgeting, avoiding unnecessary expenses and living below means.
Your FarTwin will be willing to spend more on experiences, luxury items, or philanthropy, prioritizing enjoyment over frugality.
